ygData.subject: Wooly Mammoths
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Best cash in the game at that level range, the only snag is that it only takes two people with track to comfortably kill the Mammoths as fast as they pop.
ygData.messageBody:
>Over eight pp per tusk for my druid halfling selling
>at home in Rivervale. Pretty profitable and exp as
>well. Glad I moved to Everfrost.

Best cash in the game at that level range, the only
snag is that it only takes two people with track to
comfortably kill the Mammoths as fast as they pop.
Three and the zone is over hunted. Thus I don't
recommend going there to anyone but druids. Track is
absolutely essential or you just plain won't get any
mobs, and even more important is the ability to leave
and go hunt in SK or somewhere else when the zone is
overcrowded.
